title: Raven, Fire and Ice
description: Lucinda Ravensburgh sees the truth in everything she touches. When Captain Magda Stoner of the airship Verity, asks for her help in a very strange and messy crime, Lucinda cannot refuse. From that moment on, Lucindaâ€™s life is changed forever. She discovers, no matter what the obstacle, nor the troubles they encounter, finding the truth is paramount.Book One in the Touch of Truth series.
author: Nita Round
